Section.Catchline: Judgments upon claims of third persons.

SectionBody.Text: Upon the verdict of the jury, the court shall enter judgment deciding the right of property, and if the verdict is for plaintiff, awarding a recovery by the plaintiff from the defendant and his or her sureties, of the value (as fixed by the officer, or as fixed by the jury if fixed by it) of such parts of the property as the jury may have found subject to execution, and awarding separately such damages as the jury may have awarded, and of all costs attending the presentation and trial of the claim.
